product_name: Lowa Vivione II GTX Hiking Boots - Women's
long_description: The Lowa Vivione II GTX hiking boots are designed on a women-specific last with FreeFlex design for cream-of-the-crop comfort on your treks into the wilderness. Thick, waxed nubuck leather uppers are durable and flexible, offering long-lasting protection and comfort; rubber toe and heel caps protect uppers from abrasion. GORE-TEX(R) waterproof liners let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements, keeping them dry and comfortable. Moisture-wicking polyester linings offer excellent climate control within boots by moving sweat away from feet, helping reduce the chances of blisters developing. Perforations inside cuff linings let heat and moisture out so your feet can enjoy a cool, dry and blister-free environment. C4 system uses an asymmetric padded tongue, soft edging, recessed ankle cut and curved insert for tailored comfort across instep. Tongue stud X-Lacing system establishes better pressure distribution over the instep. Flex Fit construction facilitates natural ankle flex without compromising stability, resulting in a more comfortable stride. Polyurethane midsoles in the Lowa Vivione II GTX hiking boots offer outstanding cushioning for all-day wear. Nylon shanks enhance torsional rigidity to protect and support feet. Vibram(R) Apptrail rubber outsoles feature aggressive lugs, self-cleaning tread and a pronounced edge at front of heel for excellent downhill traction.
short_description: The Lowa Vivione II GTX hiking boots are designed on a women-specific last with FreeFlex design for cream-of-the-crop comfort on your treks into the wilderness.
